feedback: The prompt effectively captures the luxurious essence of the jewelry with detailed descriptions of materials, lighting, camera movements, and desired aesthetic. It specifies 8k resolution, macro lens, cinematic style, and subtle lighting effects that evoke exclusivity and refinement. Minor enhancements could include explicitly mentioning the reflective qualities of the rose gold and diamond sparkle to reinforce the luxury aspect. Overall, it meets the high standards for a premium jewelry commercial.
critique_points: The prompt could specify the reflective properties of rose gold and diamond sparkle more explicitly.
While lighting is described as warm and golden, emphasizing the final luxurious glow or shimmer could strengthen the visual cue.
Camera movements are well-articulated but could include more about depth of field to enhance the focus on the pendant.
